rescuecore2.config

Class AbstractValueConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • rescuecore2.config.AbstractValueConstraint
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigConstraint, ValueConstraint
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassNameSetValueConstraint, ClassNameValueConstraint, DiscreteValueConstraint, FloatValueConstraint, IntegerValueConstraint

    public abstract class AbstractValueConstraint
extends java.lang.Object
implements ValueConstraint
    Abstract base class for value constraints.
